title: 5.2 Master Challenge 3
question:
Prepare a document of a minimum of three pages explaining different types of pollution.

1. Add images wherever applicable.
2. Insert captions for the images.
3. Highlight the types of pollution.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
